author: Staff Reporter
text: Tirunelveli Third Additional Sessions Judge Thaneswaran on Saturday sentenced a murder accused to undergo life imprisonment. According to prosecution, T. Mayandi (39) of Nambi Thalaivan Pattayam was found guilty of murdering E. Maharaja (65) of the same locality in 2014 over a land dispute. Thirukkurungudi police filed a case. Fine of R.1,000 was also imposed on him.
title: Man sentenced to life
